channel.title: Need help with crowns and other stuffs
channel.description:
Well i try to add a Donator Crown and rights , Onwer Crown ...
The problems are :
1.I dont find a good tutorial about this 2.In Spirites there is no image with any crown 3.I dont know what is the donator rights ....
I'm using Aintaro's Server - Dragon-History V4

item.title: Need help with crowns and other stuffs
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

johno2:

Download Toms suite editor, load up the cache, click “view/edit Jagex Items” Then click “Media” Find crowns in there.

Or you could just add customs crowns to the client

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with crowns and other stuffs
